## Survey!

- Download and open project 
- Switch between map themes
- Center to your GPS, check accuracy of GPS signal 
- Record point object with photo, date and type. Save. Change any attribute
- Record polygon object. Save. Change its geometry
- Record line object. Add 3 photos to the feature
- Inspect changes you made to project
- Send your changes to cloud

## Advanced Features

- External GNSS
- GNSS Accuracy (+warning)
- Streaming recording
- Position trancking (background)
- Reuse last value
- Diagnostics logs
- Layers & Legend (visibility/off)
- Stake Out
